title: Iran Military Unit General killed In Israeli Strike In Lebanon: Report
content: A senior general in Iran's Revolutionary Guards Corps was killed in an Israeli air strike in Lebanon alongside Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah, state media reported Saturday.
summary: A senior general in Iran's Revolutionary Guards Corps was killed in an Israeli air strike in Lebanon alongside Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah, state media reported Saturday.

title: Hezbollah Chief's Path "Will Continue" Despite His Killing: Iran
content: Iran's foreign ministry said Saturday the path of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah will continue despite his killing in an Israeli air strike in Beirut, after a year of cross-border clashes between the two sides.
summary: Iran's foreign ministry said Saturday the path of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah will continue despite his killing in an Israeli air strike in Beirut, after a year of cross-border clashes between the two sides.

title: Humans Could Turn Green And Lose Eyesight While Living On Mars: Biologist
content: The dream of colonising Mars appears difficult to achieve due to the brutal conditions on the planet, which experts have warned can cause people to turn green and lose their eyesight.
summary: The dream of colonising Mars appears difficult to achieve due to the brutal conditions on the planet, which experts have warned can cause people to turn green and lose their eyesight.

title: "Learnt No Lessons": Iran Supreme Leader After Hezbollah Chief's Death
content: Lashing out after the death of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah and civilians in strikes on Lebanon's Beirut, Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has said the savage nature of the "rabid Zionist regime" has been revealed.
summary: Lashing out after the death of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah and civilians in strikes on Lebanon's Beirut, Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has said the savage nature of the "rabid Zionist regime" has been revealed.

title: Hezbollah Confirms Leader Hassan Nasrallah's Death After Israeli Strike
content: Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah has been killed, the Iran-backed group said on Saturday, confirming his death after the Israeli military said it had eliminated him in an airstrike in Beirut the day before.
summary: Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah has been killed, the Iran-backed group said on Saturday, confirming his death after the Israeli military said it had eliminated him in an airstrike in Beirut the day before.

title: Colonialism Turned Tigers To Trophies. How India Moved Humans To Save Them
content: British colonialism turned Indias tigers into trophies. Between 1860 and 1950, more than 65,000 were shot for their skins. The fortunes of the Bengal tiger, one of Earths biggest species of big cat, did not markedly improve post-independence.
summary: British colonialism turned Indias tigers into trophies. Between 1860 and 1950, more than 65,000 were shot for their skins. The fortunes of the Bengal tiger, one of Earths biggest species of big cat, did not markedly improve post-independence.

title: Most Of Hezbollah's Senior Leaders "Eliminated," Says Israeli Army
content: Israel's military said Saturday that "most" senior leaders of Hezbollah had been killed, after it announced the death of Hassan Nasrallah, the head of the group, which has not provided confirmation.
summary: Israel's military said Saturday that "most" senior leaders of Hezbollah had been killed, after it announced the death of Hassan Nasrallah, the head of the group, which has not provided confirmation.

title: More Indians Than Ever Holidaying Abroad - Where Are They Heading And Why?
content: Travel is on the rise again. According to the UN's tourism agency, international travel for all purposes reached 97% of its pre-pandemic level in the first quarter of 2024.
summary: Travel is on the rise again. According to the UN's tourism agency, international travel for all purposes reached 97% of its pre-pandemic level in the first quarter of 2024.

title: NASA To Launch Rescue Mission To Bring Home Sunita Williams, Barry Wilmore
content: The National Aeronautics Space Agency (NASA) is all set to launch a mission on September 28 to facilitate the return of astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore.
summary: The National Aeronautics Space Agency (NASA) is all set to launch a mission on September 28 to facilitate the return of astronauts Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore.

title: "Came To Class To Hurt Somebody": Arizona Teenager Stabs Classmate
content: A student at the Arizona State University was hospitalised after being stabbed several times by a classmate. Mara Daffron, 19, was attacked by Kaci Sloan, also 19, who reportedly chose her as an "easier target," reported The New York Post.
summary: A student at the Arizona State University was hospitalised after being stabbed several times by a classmate. Mara Daffron, 19, was attacked by Kaci Sloan, also 19, who reportedly chose her as an "easier target," reported The New York Post.

title: "Getting Shorter, Going Hungrier": Children In The UK Are Living In Poverty
content: Children's lives in the UK are changing. They are becoming shorter in height. More of them are going hungry than they were a few years ago.
summary: Children's lives in the UK are changing. They are becoming shorter in height. More of them are going hungry than they were a few years ago.

title: Opinion: Why Is Israel Playing With Fire? Because It Has Understood It Can

title: Israel Army Says Nation On Alert After Claiming It Killed Hezbollah Chief
content: The Israeli military said on Saturday Israel is on high alert for a broader conflict after it claimed to have killed Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut, and also said it hoped his reported death will cause the group to change course.
summary: The Israeli military said on Saturday Israel is on high alert for a broader conflict after it claimed to have killed Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut, and also said it hoped his reported death will cause the group to change course.

title: Iran's Supreme Leader Moved After Israel Claims Hezbollah Chief Killed
content: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has been transferred to a secure location inside the country with heightened security measures in place, two regional officials briefed by Tehran told Reuters.
summary: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has been transferred to a secure location inside the country with heightened security measures in place, two regional officials briefed by Tehran told Reuters.

title: "Not The End": Israeli Army After Announcing Hezbollah Chief's Death
content: Israel's army chief has vowed to target anyone who poses a threat to Israel after the Israeli Defence Force reported the killing of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah today.
summary: Israel's army chief has vowed to target anyone who poses a threat to Israel after the Israeli Defence Force reported the killing of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah today.

title: Hassan Nasrallah Is Dead. This Cleric Is Now Tipped To Lead Hezbollah
content: Hassan Nasrallah is dead. The Hezbollah chief's death has now been confirmed by the Iran-backed, Lebanon-based group.
summary: Hassan Nasrallah is dead. The Hezbollah chief's death has now been confirmed by the Iran-backed, Lebanon-based group.

title: Hezbollah Chief Killed In Israel Strike: "Will No Longer Terrorise The World"
content: Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah was killed in a strike on Beirut, the Israeli military said today.
summary: Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah was killed in a strike on Beirut, the Israeli military said today.

title: UK Couple Kicked Off Plane For Indulging In "Sexual Activity"
content: Both Bradley, 22, and Antonia, 20, pleaded guilty this week to a charge of outraging public decency by committing a sexual act in a public place.
summary: Both Bradley, 22, and Antonia, 20, pleaded guilty this week to a charge of outraging public decency by committing a sexual act in a public place.

title: 6 Killed In Russian Attacks On Medical Centre, Says Ukraine
content: Two consecutive Russian attacks on a medical centre in Sumy in northeastern Ukraine on Saturday morning killed six people, Ukraine's interior minister said.
summary: Two consecutive Russian attacks on a medical centre in Sumy in northeastern Ukraine on Saturday morning killed six people, Ukraine's interior minister said.

title: New Revelations About Princess Diana, Rumours On Harry's "Biological Father"
content: Princess Diana's hairdresser has weighed in on the controversy surrounding Prince Harry and her riding instructor James Hewitt.
summary: Princess Diana's hairdresser has weighed in on the controversy surrounding Prince Harry and her riding instructor James Hewitt.
